attributes.action: MPs please listen to over 16 Million people that voted REMAIN and block Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: We feel MPs work in the best interest of the British Public protecting our interests and we firmly believe that the Leave champagne has misled the British people and leaving the EU would threaten the break up of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: We feel that being in the EU makes The United Kingdom a stronger and safer society and personally we want our children to have the freedom of movement to work, live and prosper in the EU, and we feel it is wrong to deny them of having this future.
